name: Elemental Warriors
description:
The game is single player and local PvP or Co-Op from 1 to 4 players split screen.

The game is perfect for Local Party or Single Player survival.

The XBOX PC Controlers are working for all 4 players in split screen, but still you can controle player one with Keyboard and Mouse.

You will be able to copite against other players and ai bots in survival mod aming the score.
